definition: to be convinced/to be sure/to firmly believe/to be positive that/definite news
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: He was sure, he said diplomatically, that the government would do all it could.
sentences.chinese: 梁先生曾婉轉表示，他確信政府已經盡力。

sentences.english: Consult personal sites only when you are convinced of their reliability.
sentences.chinese: 只有在您確信個人網站的可靠性後才能利用它們。

sentences.english: Are you aware that many researchers are convinced that prolonged close work causes myopia?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲，許多研究員確信長期近距離工作引起近視嗎？

sentences.english: I am convinced that blue skies are already on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 我確信湛藍的天空已經在地平線上。

sentences.english: And I'm convinced self-depreciation goes right to the heart of our financial ruts.
sentences.chinese: 我確信自我貶值促成了我們理財習慣的核心。

sentences.english: I'm sure a writer… for two years.
sentences.chinese: 我確信什麼也無法阻止李蕾成爲一名作家。

sentences.english: Light can be trusted to curve only in a vertical plane.
sentences.chinese: 可確信光線僅在垂直面內作曲線傳播。

sentences.english: Taste the food before the King eats to make sure it's not poisoned.
sentences.chinese: 在國王用餐之前先嚐嘗食物，確信飯菜沒有被下毒。

sentences.english: There is a lesson in all of this, but I am not sure what.
sentences.chinese: 這其中蘊含着一個道理，但我還不確信那是什麼。

sentences.english: Now more than ever I think angels should be pricing rounds.
sentences.chinese: 現在我更確信，應該以確定價格的方式做天使投資。

sentences.english: And I couldn’t get Daddy and his confident deathbed prediction that I would win out of my mind.
sentences.chinese: 我始終想着老爸在臨終前確信的預言，他說我會勝出。

sentences.english: The Team members all nodded to him, looking quite convinced.
sentences.chinese: 團隊成員都對他點着頭，看起來非常確信。

sentences.english: I am sure she is a virgin.
sentences.chinese: 她又冷又貞靜，我確信她是個處女。

sentences.english: You are very self-assured and you implement ideas with a self- assurance that lets nothing get in your way of success.
sentences.chinese: 你充滿自信，確信沒有什麼能阻擋你走向成功。

sentences.english: It's well established that Americans are reading fewer books than they used to.
sentences.chinese: 美國人讀的書比過去少多了，這是確信無疑的。

sentences.english: I'm not sure yet, it is she, who's responsible for my sprain !
sentences.chinese: 我不確信是她嗎，誰爲我的腿來負責任。

definition: conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
to maintain (that sth is true)/to determine (a fact)/determination (of an amount)/of the firm opinion/to believe firmly/to set one's mind on/to identify with
persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
proof/certificate/identification/testimonial/CL:個|个[ge4]/to prove/to testify/to confirm the truth of
